Huizengek's apps/forks

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are binaries buit from source by Huizengek using the toold on https://gitlab.com/fdroid

Currently it serves 5 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://25huizengek1.github.io/fdroid-repo/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
55 55 7D 98 6F E8 5D 81 3F 3B 54 61 39 29 2B F0 90 84 ED 79 96 B6 5A D5 09 E2 C8 8D 10 DF F0 43
